entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Snow or rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
